questions.text: What's the name of the show that appears on the television at the beginning of the music video 'My Name Is'?
Who appears at the end of the music video 'My Name Is' when Eminem leaves the podium?
What colour are Eminems lips when he is impersonating Marylin Manson?
Eddie puts his hat on backwards?
questions.explanation:
True.

	When he's about to rob the liquor store he puts his hat backwards. Notice how his conscience Dr. Dre and Eminem have their hat backwards too.

Japan.

	Yes, you see a glimpse of her while Dr.Dre says, 'Look at the store clerk she's older than George Burns.'

questions.text: Where do Stan and the young girl bump into first before throwing her into the couch?
questions.explanation:
pool table.

	When they go into the room you see a pool table right there its green you can't miss it.

questions.text: Who comes in the room when Eminem is sitting in the corner of the bed?
What colour are Eminem's boxers in the video 'Role Model'?
questions.explanation:
grey.

	You only get to see a little bit, but you still get to see the boxer rim.

questions.text: Whom does Eminem attack while being dressed as a super hero in the video 'Real Slim Shady'?
questions.explanation:
Justin.

	Notice the curly hair on his head? That's a guy impersonating him. The red hair on the other gives it away that they are NSYNC.

questions.text: What colour is Eminem's jacket when he interviews himself in the video Real Slim Shady?
